role.descr: specific part of organ, if in addition to :ARG2
ARG5: physical manifestation (tumor/mass references; also adenocarcinoma when it points to the physical mass entity)

example.amr: (f / follow-up-03 :ARG1 (a2 / adenocarcinoma-01 :ARG2 (a / anatomical-site :primary + :name (n2 / name :op1 "colon")) :ARG1-of (m / metastasize-101 :ARG4 a)))
